means: 憎恨，厌恶( loathe的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He is loathed by some of the more traditionally minded officers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为某些思想较守旧的官员所憎恶。

sentence.Network_en: He was the quintessence of all that Eva most deeply loathed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是伊娃最深恶痛绝的那种人中的典型。

sentence.Network_en: Baker loathed going to this red - haired young pup for supplies.
sentence.Network_cn: 面包师傅不喜欢去这个红头发的自负的傻小子那里拿原料.

PerfectNetExp.abs: she loathed going to these conferences ., 她最讨厌去参加这些会议.
the DKBA is much loathed , and many of its soldiers might join the KNU if it had any scent of victory .民主克伦佛教军非常令人憎恶。假如克伦族联盟有胜利的迹象，可能会有很多民主克伦佛教军的士兵加入其中。

list.abs: they loathe Bronka Ginsberg but aren't about to cross her .他们厌恶勃隆卡?京斯贝格，但不想和她作对。
ooh - did i say that i loathe you oh ., 我曾经说过厌恶你么.
I tell you I loathe and abhor my husband and I utterly despise him ., 我告诉你 , 我厌恶 , 憎恨我的丈夫 , 我彻底地看不起他!
I loathe you !, 我讨厌你!
loath什么意思及同义词... ... lief or loath 不管愿不愿意 nothing loath 很愿意,很乐意 loath to depart 送别的曲子.
loath的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... be loath for him to go 不愿意他去 nothing loath 很愿意, 很高兴.

entry.def: If you loathe something or someone, you dislike them very much.

example.ex: The two men loathe each other...
example.tran: 两个男人互相看不顺眼。

example.ex: She loathed being the child of impoverished labourers.
example.tran: 她憎恨自己是贫困工人的孩子。

auth_sentence.content: From being generally disliked, Ginger Finucane was now loathed.
auth_sentence.res_content: From being generally disliked, Ginger Finucane was now loathed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: From being generally disliked, Ginger Finucane was now loathed.

auth_sentence.content: Loved and loathed in equal measure, but remembered by all.
auth_sentence.res_content: Loved and loathed in equal measure, but remembered by all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Loved and loathed in equal measure, but remembered by all.

auth_sentence.content: She loathed exposure and sought possibly surreptitioously.
auth_sentence.res_content: She loathed exposure and sought possibly surreptitioously.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She loathed exposure and sought possibly surreptitioously.
